name: Penalty
text:
[§571-57]  Penalty.  The penalty for the offense of making a false statement under "penalty of perjury" shall be the same as would apply if the false statement had been made under oath or affirmation required or authorized by law. [L 1970, c 17, pt of §1]
 
Cross References
 
  Perjury and related offenses, see §§710-1060 to 1068.
